article_title: CVS' Andy Sussman On How Walk-In Clinics Are Changing The Healthcare Business

article_metadata.description: Until recently, thanks to the proliferation of walk-in clinics, the impatient patient in need can now drive to the local drugstores to get medical treatment. In response to the aggravations of full-service primary care offices and high-cost of ERs, the walk-in clinic has become a rapidly emerging trend.  "We face a [...]
